title: Silver VThresh One Trick LF Duo (Jungle or ADC)

embed.description: LexyTheDeer / Silver 4 66LP / 250W 301L Win Ratio 45% / Thresh - 71W 94L Win Ratio 43%, Blitzcrank - 68W 64L Win Ratio 52%, Jarvan IV - 42W 34L Win Ratio 55%, Alistar - 14W 15L Win Ratio 48%, Twitch - 7W 14L Win Ratio 33%

body:
Hi all, I'm looking for Duo who is a Jungler or ADC.  Was gold 2 last season, and looking at returning back to Platinum, currently Silver V due to a long break, of the previous meta change.

Twitch.TV: https://www.twitch.tv/lexythedeer

replies.body: I believe so, I remember he used to post on the boards at least once a week before hitting gold last season. I think a guy called Lavalord and a number of other people weren't happy wiith him so he changed names.

U dont believe? This lavalord guys been on his case for a while, Idk which side is right/wrong, but these things don't happen for no reason.


[LINKS REMOVED - Basically all the linked posts/comments broke the boards rules so I cleared them out. What the truth of the matter is I don't know, but boards isn't the place to air grievances (even if it was a year ago)]

Just wondering, did u hit gold last season as support or did u change roles? Ur most played champ has 42% after 170 Played. Im happy to duo if you can play other stuff, but i dont have faith in ur support if ur struggling at Silver 5.

he gets others to play on his account. i think last season the guy had like 20 wins all up on panth, kass, kat all undefeated. stomping lane and game easily plat level just monstrous stats. then never played the champs agian. like first time ranked for those champs. short answer he gets boosted and is a legit silver 5 bronze 1 player no more then that.
yea sure i play both! i want out aswell
